team module¶

class team.Team(name, members)¶

Bases: pygame.sprite.Group

Defines a type team for which players will belong to. This class helps with the cycling of turns, and determining the winner.

Parameters:
  • name – Name of the team.
  • members – The players
next()¶

Sets the next player to take a turn.

reset_cycle()¶

Begins the cycling process. (Used especially when a player dies so that the game will not get stuck.)
